title: About Simula Digital
text: We're web development agency based locally in Orlando, FL. As a small but capable team, we take pride in delivering creative, high-quality solutions tailored to each client. Our focus is on building strong relationships and making digital projects feel personal and approachable.

section.title: Who We Are
section.content: Simula Digital is a husband and wife duo who love turning ideas into polished digital experiences. Being small means we're flexible, fast, and invested in every project we take on.

section.title: What We Do
section.content: From custom web design and development to analytics dashboards, mobile apps, and even small games, we help businesses bring their vision to life with practical and innovative technology.
